sentence.Network_en: He was sent to Eritrea to reconnoitre the enemy position.
sentence.Network_cn: 他被派往厄立特里亚侦察敌军位置。

sentence.Network_en: Eritrea, with only 5 m people, simply cannot keep up.
sentence.Network_cn: Eritrea根本没有办法与之跟进, 他只有500万人口.

sentence.Network_en: In 2002 it awarded the disputed village of Badme to Eritrea.
sentence.Network_cn: 在2002年,他得到了有争议的Eritrea巴德梅村.
